1.0.0.name: wordpress/proper-twitter-widget
1.0.0.description:
Simple plugin which wraps a Twitter widget as a Wordpress widget.

In order to use it, you need the Twitter widget's ID - something like 332108549298064896. You can see it in the embeddable code Twitter gives you after you create the widget. You also need the Twitter username for the account the widget belongs to.
